properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 20 at 6:00AM EST until January 22 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft. For the Gale Watch,
north winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and seas 6 to
11 ft possible.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 11 AM EST Tuesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Tuesday morning through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
